#summary The rel="contact" attribute indicates that the referenced document contains contact information for the current document.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

`rel="contact"` is one of several [LinkTypes link types] for describing relationships between documents.

== Usage ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `rel="contact"` attribute on these elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||

== Further reading ==

  * [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/#contact The rel="contact" link type in HTML 5]
  * [http://www.w3.org/TR/html401/types.html#type-links Link types in HTML 4]
